name: Jatayus Journey
description:
This is the very first 2D game that has been developed by the Digital Group of Games For Seva.  Jatayu's Journey takes Flappy Bird into the deep roots of Hindu tradition.  Jatayu our hero has to navigate through Ravana's swords to be able to find and save Lady Sita.  

Credit(s):

Assets used - these are under copyright of Games For Seva and Young Indian Culture Group Inc a 501.3(c) organization committed towards raising awareness of Hindu heritage amongst Indian American youth

For having Flappy Bird as our inspiration - the developers, and team behind the original Flappy Bird are given credit

Background Track - Despacito (Indian Version) created by Mahesh Raghvan 

Lastly, I have a request, if you happen to come across this game, please play it and provide some comments on improvements etc... We at the Digital Group love feedback and want to do better development, and want to hear from you! 

Happy Gaming!

Games For Seva - Digital Group
